properties.entry: INSERT INTO user_acc( email, username, password, legal_name, language_code, country_code, timezone_tz ) VALUES(?, ? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT * FROM user_acc WHERE id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
UPDATE user_acc SET email = ?, username = ?, password = ?, legal_name = ?, language_code = ?, country_code = ?, timezone_tz = ? WHERE id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
UPDATE user_acc SET deleted = NOW() WHERE id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_acc WHERE (email LIKE ? OR username LIKE ?) AND deleted IS NULL;
INSERT INTO contract_template( account_id, title, version, body, modified ) VALUES(?, ? ,?, ?, ?);
SELECT * FROM contract_template WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
UPDATE contract_template SET title = ?, version = ?, body = ?, modified = ? WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND versioned IS NULL AND deleted IS NULL;
UPDATE contract_template SET deleted = now() WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM contract_template WHERE account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM contract_template WHERE account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL AND body LIKE ?;
UPDATE contract_template SET versioned = NOW() WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND versioned IS NULL AND deleted IS NULL AND version IS NOT NULL;
UPDATE contract_template SET published = NOW() WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND versioned IS NOT NULL AND deleted IS NULL AND published IS NULL;
INSERT INTO contract( account_id, memo, body, modified ) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT * FROM contract WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
UPDATE contract SET memo = ?, body = ?, modified = ? WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND proposed IS NULL AND deleted IS NOT NULL;
UPDATE contract SET deleted = now() WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM contract WHERE account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM contract WHERE account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL AND proposed IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM contract WHERE account_id = ? AND deleted IS NULL AND proposed IS NOT NULL;
UPDATE contract SET proposed = now() WHERE id = ? AND account_id = ? AND proposed IS NULL AND deleted IS NULL;
INSERT INTO deal_dialog( deal_id, account_id, seq_num, contract_id ) VALUES(?, ?, 0, ?);
CALL sp_post_nth_dialog_message(?, ?, ?, ?);
INSERT INTO contract_party( contract_id, account_id, valid_until, signature, signed_on ) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, NOW());

SELECT d.*, c.id AS contract_id FROM deal d INNER JOIN deal_dialog i ON d.id = i.deal_id INNER JOIN contract c ON i.contract_id = c.id INNER JOIN contract_party p ON c.id = p.contract_id WHERE p.account_id = ? AND p.signature IS NULL AND p.valid_until > NOW() AND d.deleted IS NULL;

SELECT d.*, c.id AS contract_id FROM deal d INNER JOIN deal_dialog i ON d.id = i.deal_id INNER JOIN contract c ON i.contract_id = c.id INNER JOIN contract_party p ON c.id = p.contract_id AND c.account_id = p.account_id WHERE d.account_id = ? AND p.valid_until > NOW() AND d.deleted IS NULL;

SELECT d.*, c.id AS contract_id FROM deal d INNER JOIN deal_dialog i ON d.id = i.deal_id INNER JOIN contract c ON i.contract_id = c.id INNER JOIN contract_party p ON c.id = p.contract_id WHERE p.account_id = ? AND p.signature IS NOT NULL AND d.deleted IS NULL AND p.contract_id NOT IN ( SELECT contract_id FROM contract_party WHERE signature IS NULL );

SELECT d.*, c.id AS contract_id FROM contract c INNER JOIN contract_party p ON c.id = p.contract_id INNER JOIN deal_dialog i ON c.id = i.contract_id INNER JOIN deal d ON i.deal_id = d.id WHERE p.account_id = ? AND p.signature IS NULL AND d.deleted IS NULL;
SELECT p.* FROM deal_dialog d INNER JOIN contract_party p ON d.contract_id = p.contract_id WHERE d.deal_id = ? AND d.seq_num = 0;
